definition: step with the left foot (Kangxi radical 60)/see also 彳亍[chi4 chu4]
(old) jade tablet (a ceremonial badge of rank)
step with the right foot/see 彳亍[chi4 chu4]
subdistrict office/neighborhood official/an official who works with local residents to report to higher government authorities
to take a walk/to window-shop/to stroll down the street
Wall Street, New York/by extension, American big business
to go onto the streets/to go shopping
great streets and small alleys (idiom); everywhere in the city
Lao Cai, Vietnam/Laokai or Laukkai, Burma (Myanmar)

sentences.english: Turn right onto Ford Road and take the first street on your left.
sentences.chinese: 右转到福特路，然后第一条街左转。

sentences.english: And along the Strand, up Queen Victoria Street.
sentences.chinese: 流过河滨大街，直上维多利亚街。

sentences.english: Go down Center Street and my house is on your right .
sentences.chinese: 走中心街与我的房子是你的权利。

sentences.english: The view is of the nondescript building across the street.
sentences.chinese: 风景就是对面街那不可名状的建筑物。

sentences.english: The busiest shopping area is Oxford Street, where famous large department stores are located.
sentences.chinese: 最繁华的购物区是拥有著名大百货公司的牛津街。

sentences.english: Xiao Hong's former residence was situated at the South Second Street located on the secluded corner of this county town.
sentences.chinese: 萧红故居，坐落于县城较偏僻的南二道街。

sentences.english: Center Street is a good place to have fun.
sentences.chinese: 中心街是一个能够玩得开心的地方。

sentences.english: This day, John sees a drama again, call 《park street murder case 》.
sentences.chinese: 这天，约翰又去看一出戏，叫《公园街谋杀案》。

sentences.english: It is at ground level at rear lane between How Ming Street and Chong Yip Street.
sentences.chinese: 位于巧明街及创业街之间的后巷地面。

sentences.english: It's down Bridge Street on the right.
sentences.chinese: 它就在大桥街的路右边。

sentences.english: I'm a resident of Rose Park on St. Johnson Street.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个居住在圣约翰逊街玫瑰花园的居民。

sentences.english: Addams founded Hull House on Halsted Street in Chicago in 1889.
sentences.chinese: 赫尔馆于1889年在芝加哥的特德街成立。

sentences.english: Follow this road and turn left Happy Road.
sentences.chinese: 顺着这条街走，然后左拐进入快乐路。

sentences.english: Pet Health Animal Clinic, G/F, 24 Sai Yee Street, Mongkok, Kowloon, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 柏得康动物诊所，香港九龙旺角洗衣街24号地下。

sentences.english: Do you mean the Performing Arts Theater on Marshall Street?
sentences.chinese: 你是指在马歇尔街的表演艺术剧院吗？

definition: side street/road branching from the main street
Lao Cai, Vietnam/Laokai or Laukkai, Burma (Myanmar)
